Poverty reduction would also reduce crime and social unrest, creating a more peaceful and stable society.

This would reduce healthcare costs, improve productivity, and increase life expectancy. Additionally, the reduced burden on healthcare systems would allow for more investment in other areas, such as education and infrastructure.
